info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:32PM CDT until May 01 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SHERMAN...SOUTHERN DALLAM...NORTHWESTERN MOORE AND NORTHERN HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 432 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Romero to 4 miles north of Channing, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Hartley, Cactus and Ware. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
